com.panviva.util.pgc.util

Class FileHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.panviva.util.pgc.util.FileHelper

  • public abstract class FileHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    Convenience class to manage the wildcard listing of matching files in a directory and all its sub-directories.
    Author:
    jcharles

      • getExpandedFileList

        public static java.util.List<java.io.File> getExpandedFileList(java.lang.String[] args,
                                                               java.lang.String wildcard)
        Expand the command line list of files or directories specified. If the command line is a single file it added to the file list as a single entry. If the command line contains a directory it expands all files matching the wildcard in the immediate directory and all sub-directories If the command line is a file wildcard, it retrieves the parent directory and extracts all files matching the *.docx wildcard
        Parameters:
        args - Remaining command line arguments
        wildcard - Command line wildcard value
        Returns:
        List of files in this folder and all child folders expanded from the wildcard

      • copyFile

        public static void copyFile(java.io.File sourceFile,
                            java.io.File destFile)
                     throws java.io.IOException
        Static method to copy a source file to a destination file
        Parameters:
        sourceFile - The source file
        destFile - The destination file
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Exception thrown if there is a problem copying the source file to the destination
